general.headline: Hong Kong stands as key beneficiary of China's continued opening up efforts
general.summary: Hong Kong's strength as an asset and wealth management hub stems from its role as the gateway to mainland China, according to panellists at a forum on Friday, citing the city's deep connection to a vast pool of Chinese resources, capital flows and entrepreneurial innovation.
general.source: Alpha Vantage - South China Morning Post

general.headline: Wall Street's next crypto play may be IPO-ready crypto firms, not altcoins
general.summary: Wall Street capital is flowing into late-stage, IPO-ready crypto firms, signaling new dynamics at play for the incoming altcoin season.
